content.name: Basic Effect
content.description: Deal 2 damage and 1 mark to a target you can see.

content.name: Second Lock
content.description: Deal 1 mark to a different target you can see.

content.name: Basic Effect
content.description: Choose 1 or 2 targets you can see and deal 1 damage to each.

content.name: Basic Effect - 2nd target
content.description: Choose a second target you can see and deal 1 damage to them.

content.name: Focus Shot
content.description: Deal 1 additional damage to the first of those two targets.

content.name: Turret Tripod
content.description: Deal 1 additional damage to the other of those targets or to a new different target you can see.

content.name: Basic Effect
content.description: Deal 2 damage to a target you can see.

content.name: Chain Reaction
content.description: Deal 1 damage to a second target that your first target can see.

content.name: High Voltage
content.description: Deal 2 damage to a third target that your second target can see.

content.name: Basic Effect
content.description: Deal 2 damage to a target you can see.

content.name: Phase Glide
content.description: Move up to 2 squares.

content.name: Charged Shot
content.description: Deal 2 damage to a target you can see.

content.name: Effect
content.description: Deal 3 damage and 1 mark to a target you can see that is at least 2 moves away from you.

content.name: Basic Mode
content.description: Deal 1 damage to every other player on your cell.

content.name: Reaper Mode
content.description: Deal 2 damage to every other player on your cell.

content.name: Basic Mode
content.description: Move a target to a cell you can see that is up to 2 moves away from them.

content.name: Punisher Mode
content.description: Move to your cell a target that is up to 2 moves away, then deal 3 damage to them.

content.name: Basic Effect
content.description: Choose a cell you can see, but not your cell. Call it "the vortex". Choose a target up to 1 move away from the vortex, and move them on the vortex, then deal 2 damage to them.

content.name: Black Hole
content.description: Choose up to 2 other targets that are up to 1 move away from the vortex. Move them both to the vortex and deal 1 damage to each.

content.name: Black Hole - 2nd target
content.description: Choose the other target, up to 1 move away from the vortex. Move them onto the vortex and give them 1 damage.

content.name: Basic Mode
content.description: Choose a room you can see, but not the one you are in. Deal 1 damage to everyone in that room.

content.name: Cozy Fire Mode
content.description: Choose a cell exactly 1 move away from you and deal 1 damage and 1 mark to everyone on that cell.

content.name: Effect
content.description: Choose a target you can't see and deal 3 damage to them.

content.name: Basic Mode
content.description: Deal 1 damage to a target you can see, at least 1 move away. Then give 1 mark to your target and everyone else on that cell.

content.name: Nano-Tracer Mode
content.description: Deal 1 damage to a target you can see, at least 1 move away. Then give 2 marks to your target and everyone else on that cell.

content.name: Basic Mode
content.description: Deal 1 damage to a player exactly 1 move away.

content.name: Basic Mode - 2nd Target
content.description: Deal 1 damage to another target, 2 moves away and in the same direction as the first one.

content.name: Barbecue Mode
content.description: Choose a cell exactly one move away and deal 2 damage to everyone on that cell.

content.name: Barbecue Mode - 2nd Target
content.description: Choose a cell 2 moves away, in the same direction as the first one, and deal 1 damage to everyone on that cell.

content.name: Basic Effect
content.description: Deal 1 damage to a player. Then you may move that player by up to 1 cell.

content.name: Extra Grenade
content.description: Deal 1 damage to everyone on a cell you can see.

content.name: Basic Effect
content.description: Deal 2 damage to a player you can see that is not on your cell. Then move that player by up to 1 cell.

content.name: Rocket Jump
content.description: Move up to 2 squares.

content.name: Fragmenting Warhead
content.description: Deal 3 damage to a player you can see, that is not on your cell, and 1 damage to everyone else on that cell. Then move that player by up to 1 cell.

content.name: Basic Mode
content.description: Deal 3 damage to a player vertically or horizontally aligned with you.

content.name: Piercing Mode
content.description: Deal 2 damage to up to 2 players aligned with you in the same direction.

content.name: Basic Effect
content.description: Deal 2 damage to a player on your square.

content.name: Shadowstep
content.description: Move by up to 1 cell.

content.name: Slice & Dice
content.description: Deal 2 damage to a different target on your cell.

content.name: Basic Mode
content.description: Deal 1 damage and 2 marks to a target you can see.

content.name: Scanner Mode
content.description: Deal 1 mark to up to three different targets you can see.

content.name: Scanner Mode - 2nd Target
content.description: Deal 1 mark to a second target you can see.

content.name: Scanner Mode - 3rd Target
content.description: Deal 1 mark to a third target you can see.

content.name: Basic Mode
content.description: Deal 3 damage to a player on you cell. Then move that player by up to 1 cell.

content.name: Long Barrel Mode
content.description: Deal 2 damage to a player exactly 1 move away from you.

content.name: Basic Mode
content.description: Choose a target exactly 1 move away, move to their cell and deal 1 damage and 2 marks to them.

content.name: Rocket Fist Mode
content.description: Choose a target exactly 1 move away, move to their cell and deal 2 damage to them.

content.name: Rocket Fist Mode - 2nd Target
content.description: Choose another target exactly 1 move away in the same direction, move to their cell and deal 2 damage to them.

content.name: Basic Mode
content.description: Deal 1 damage to a player exactly 1 move away from you.

content.name: Basic Effect - 2nd Target
content.description: Deal 1 damage to a player exactly 1 move away from you, but not on the same cell as your first target.

content.name: Basic Effect - 3rd Target
content.description: Deal 1 damage to a player exactly 1 move away from you, but on on the same cell as any of your first two targets.

content.name: Tsunami Mode
content.description: Deal damage on everyone who is exactly 1 move away from you.

content.name: Basic Mode
content.description: Deal 2 damage to a player on your cell.

content.name: Pulverize Mode
content.description: Deal 3 damage to a player on your cell, then move them up to 2 cells away in a fixed direction.
